OOC: Well, honestly, this sounds like a bad episode of WWE where Undertaker=
 demands respect throughout the show but gives none in return. Where was MY=
 respect from Cardhead? He insulted me countless times and actually then tr=
ies to tell people how to post? I'm glad he's gone. The RPG doesn't need hi=
m and neither do it's members. Trust me.

I'd like to announce that unless =
the names are taken, I'd like to take characters named Warpath and Roadbloc=
k.

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Friday, June 06, 2003 1:42 AM
  Subject: Confli=
ct at the Ark

  That's it - I'm gone.  I've had it.

  If I can't get any =
respect, I'll go somewhere that I'm appreciated.  
  Somewhere that gives a=
 shit that some of its members aren't complete 
  Internet junkies that hav=
e nothing better to do than hang around one 
  website all day.

  In short=
, somewhere a hell of a lot better than this piece of shit!  
  As of right=
 now, every character I've got has ceased to exist within 
  the confines o=
f NBW.  Empath, Synergy, Wheeljack-X, Phoenix, 
  Pumpskin, Flicker (unless=
 dewboy wants him back), Skyblaze, and the 
  Rogues are gone.  Vanished wi=
thout a trace.  Forever.  And so am I!
